entry.title: 2302. Count Subarrays With Score Less Than K

link.title: 2302. Count Subarrays With Score Less Than K

entry.summary:
url: https://leetcode.com/problems/count-subarrays-with-score-less-than-k/description/
Input: nums = [2,1,4,3,5], k = 10 Output: 6 Explanation: The 6 subarrays having scores less than 10 are:
[2] with score 2 * 1 = 2. [1] with score 1 * 1 = 1. [4] with score 4 * 1 = 4. [3] with score 3 * 1 = 3. [5] with score 5 * 1 = 5. [2,1] with score (2 + 1) * 2 = 6. ğŸ’¡ No...
